title: 1993 World solar challenge
creator_credit: Don Scutt, GMH and Monash University. Mechanical Engineering, Caulfield
brief_description: Covers the 1993 Daido Hoxan World Solar Challenge, a race by solar powered cars from Darwin to Adelaide over 3000 kilometres. Includes interviews with the leading teams and technical experts.
